content: 关于我：游戏行业十余年老兵，目前就职于腾讯， 兴趣爱好广泛，喜欢数学、编程、天文等一切美好的事物。空余时，我会在这里记录下用代码创造艺术过程，也会同步到我的知乎主页。
title: 代码与艺术

content: Elvis Aaron Presley (January 8, 1935 – August 16, 1977) was an American singer and actor. Regarded as one of the most significant cultural icons of the 20th century, he is often referred to as the “King of Rock and Roll” or simply “the King”.
